pl.xml
Class Marshaller

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--pl.xml.Marshaller
public class Marshaller
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for marshalling persistence objects to xml.

Author:
Artem Rudoy

Method Summary

marshall

public void marshall(PersistentObject object,
                     org.w3c.dom.Node rootNode,
                     org.w3c.dom.Document document)
              throws PlException
Marshall the specified object and append result DOM tree to the rootNode node. Document is used as a factory for the DOM nodes.

marshall

public void marshall(PersistentObject object,
                     pl.xml.ContentHandler handler)
              throws PlException
Marshall the specified object by generating SAX events for the specified content handler.
